fields.notesFormatted:
Sermon Notes

  1. Hell is a real place.

    Revelation 21:6-8

    Matthew 10:28, 13:40-43, 22:11-13

  2. Hell is fair; it is what I deserve.

    Romans 3:10

    John 3:36

    Luke 18:18-27

  3. Most people will go to hell.

    Matthew 7:13-14

  4. Hell is final.

    Matthew 25:46

  5. God wants everyone to choose heaven.

    2 Peter 3:9

    John 3:16

    Romans 6:23
